name: Kojum: Combat Ball
description:
Kojum: Combat Ball is a football and martial arts mashup.

The team with the most goals wins. Strike, Block, or Grab the ball to send it into your opponents' goal, and if you find them getting in your way, use those same moves to knock them out for a brief period. They will be unable to move which provides you an opportunity to score.

Find the right balance between moving the ball, and fighting your opponents to dominate on the field.

Important: This is a local multiplayer game, and is best enjoyed with friends. One player may use the keyboard while additional players must use a controller to play.
